mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ESTBL_SBJCT (CRCLM_YEAR,CRCLM_HALF,CRCLM_CD,SBJCT_NO,SBJCT_NM,SBJCT_EXPLN,EDU_HR,ROOM_NO,ESNTL_YN,EDU_WEEK_HR) VALUES (#{year},#{hlf},#{crc},#{sbjcd},#{sbjnm},#{sbjxp},#{hrs},#{room},#{esntl, jdbcType=BOOLEAN},#{weekhrs}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ROOM_NO = #{room}, SBJCT_NM = #{sbjnm}, SBJCT_EXPLN = #{sbjxp}, ESNTL_YN = #{esntl, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, EDU_WEEK_HR = #{weekhrs}

INSERT IGNORE INTO LECT_TM_INFO (CRCLM_YEAR,CRCLM_HALF,CRCLM_CD,SBJCT_NO,LECT_DAY_CD,BGNG_CLS_CD,END_CLS_CD,SBJCT_MTHD_CD,ROOM_NO,INSTR_NO) VALUES (#{year},#{hlf},#{crc},#{sbjcd},#{dayCode},#{startCode},#{endCode},(SELECT SBJCT_MTHD_CD FROM SBJCT_PLAN WHERE CRCLM_YEAR=#{year} AND CRCLM_HALF=#{hlf} AND CRCLM_CD=#{crc} AND SBJCT_NO=#{sbjcd}),#{room},#{insno})
mapper.select: SELECT *,SubjectFind(SBJCT_NO) AS SBJ FROM LECT_TM_DTL WHERE CRCLM_YEAR=#{year} AND CRCLM_HALF=#{hlf} AND ROOM_NO = #{room}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECT_TM_INFO (CRCLM_CD,CRCLM_YEAR,CRCLM_HALF,SBJCT_NO,LECT_DAY_CD,BGNG_CLS_CD,END_CLS_CD,SBJCT_MTHD_CD,ROOM_NO,ENDST_NO,INSTR_NO) VALUES (#{crc},#{year},#{hlf},#{sbj},#{dayCode},#{startCode},#{endCode},'0010',#{room},'E199804001',(SELECT INSTR_NO FROM SBJCT_INSTR WHERE CRCLM_CD=#{crc} AND CRCLM_YEAR=#{year} AND CRCLM_HALF=#{hlf} AND SBJCT_NO=#{sbj}))

INSERT INTO SBJCT_INSTR (CRCLM_YEAR,CRCLM_HALF,CRCLM_CD,SBJCT_NO,INSTR_NO,RPRS_INSTR_YN) VALUES (#{year},#{hlf},#{crc},#{sbjcd},#{insno},(SELECT IF(COUNT(RPRS_INSTR_NO)>0,'Y','N') FROM CRCLM_INFO WHERE RPRS_INSTR_NO = #{insno})) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE INSTR_NO = #{insno} ,RPRS_INSTR_YN = (SELECT IF(COUNT(RPRS_INSTR_NO)>0,'Y','N') FROM CRCLM_INFO WHERE RPRS_INSTR_NO = #{insno})
